Home > Central Government > IAS Officer

IAS Officer

Indian Administrative Service - The Steel Frame of India

₹56,100
Starting Salary
₹2,50,000+
Peak Salary
30-35 Years
Service Period
All India
Posting

Career Journey & Growth Path

Sub Divisional Magistrate (SDM)
₹65,000 - ₹85,000
0-2 Years Experience
Entry level administrative position. Handle revenue cases, licensing, and basic administrative duties. Posted at sub-division level.
1
Assistant Collector / ADM
₹85,000 - ₹1,10,000
2-4 Years Experience
Assistant to District Collector. Handle land acquisition, revenue collection, and district administration support. Greater responsibilities.
2
District Collector / DM
₹1,20,000 - ₹1,60,000
4-8 Years Experience
Head of district administration. CEO of Zilla Panchayat. Handle law & order, revenue, development programs. Most prestigious field posting.
3
Deputy Secretary (Central)
₹1,40,000 - ₹1,80,000
8-12 Years Experience
Central government secretariat posting. Policy formulation, file handling, inter-ministerial coordination. Exposure to national governance.
4
Joint Secretary
₹1,80,000 - ₹2,20,000
12-16 Years Experience
Senior policy making position. Head important divisions. Brief ministers, handle Parliament questions. Significant decision-making authority.
5
Additional Secretary
₹2,20,000 - ₹2,50,000
16-22 Years Experience
Senior administrative position. Assist Secretary in ministry functioning. Handle complex policy issues and inter-state coordination.
6
Secretary to Government
₹2,50,000+
22+ Years Experience
Highest administrative position. Head of ministry/department. Direct interface with ministers. Shape national policies and governance.
7

💰 Entry Level Breakdown

Basic Pay ₹56,100
Dearness Allowance (50%) ₹28,050
House Rent Allowance (24%) ₹13,464
Transport Allowance ₹3,200
Medical Allowance ₹1,000
Gross Salary ₹1,01,814
PF & Deductions ₹15,000
Net In-hand ₹86,814

📊 Peak Level Breakdown

Basic Pay ₹2,25,000
Dearness Allowance (50%) ₹1,12,500
House Rent Allowance (24%) ₹54,000
Transport Allowance ₹15,750
Other Allowances ₹25,000
Gross Salary ₹4,32,250
PF & Deductions ₹45,000
Net In-hand ₹3,87,250
